June 26, 1876 D Lofthouse in Cleveland Contest
Lofthouse in Cleveland Contest 10 Other Lofthouse in Cleveland Contest lofthouse-in-cleveland-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Loftus-in-Cleveland See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm Taken from the report on the 1877 contest.
Additional sources: The Daily Gazette (Middlesbrough, England), Tuesday, June 27, 1876; pg. 3; Issue 2551 The York Herald (York, England), Tuesday, May 31, 1876; pg. 7; Issue 6025.
Thomas Woods conducted three of the bands.
Aug. 29, 2011, 3:10 p.m. Jan. 27, 2012, 7:07 p.m.
